original_text:
One who is full loathes honey from the comb,
    but to the hungry even what is bitter tastes sweet.
korean_text: 배부른 자는 꿀이라도 싫어하고 주린 자에게는 쓴 것이라도 다니라

sentences.original_text: One who is full loathes honey from the comb
sentences.korean_translation: 배부른 자는 벌집에서 나온 꿀을 싫어한다

sentences.original_text: even what is bitter tastes sweet
